definition.de: Höchster jüdischer Feiertag, beginnt bei Sonnenuntergang vor dem 10. Tischri und dauert bis zum nächsten Sonnenuntergang (September oder Oktober)
definition.dk: Forsoningsdag inden for den jødiske religion fejret i efteråret.
definition.en-GB: Most solemn of Jewish religious holidays, observed on the 10th day of the lunar month of tishri (in the course of September and October, when Jews seek reconciliation with god
definition.en-US: Most solemn of Jewish religious holidays, observed on the 10th day of the lunar month of tishri (in the course of September and October, when Jews seek reconciliation with god
definition.pt-BR: O mais solene dos dias santos judaicos, celebrado no 10.º dia do mês lunar de tishri (entre setembro e outubro), quando os judeus buscam a reconciliação com deus.
definition.pt-PT: O mais solene dos dias santos judaicos, celebrado no 10.º dia do mês lunar de tishri (entre setembro e outubro), quando os judeus buscam a reconciliação com deus.
definition.se: Försoningsdag inom den judiska religionen firad på hösten.
definition.zh-Hans: 最隆重的犹太宗教节日，在太阴月的第10天庆祝(在9月和10月期间，犹太人寻求与上帝和解)
